amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 116-593 to include providing authority for additional programs of work-based learning, striking the establishment of the National Advisory Committee and interagency agreement, and providing additional flexibility for the state plan process.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to provide authority for additional programs of work-based learning, strike the establishment of the National Advisory Committee and interagency agreement, and provide additional flexibility for the state plan process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smucker amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 142 - 243 (Roll no. 226).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Smucker.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Smucker amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 142 - 243 (Roll no. 226).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Smucker amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 142 - 243 (Roll no. 226).
